GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Cancel pending work at closing a MIDI substream

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 40bdb5ec957aca5c5c1924602bef6b0ab18e22d3. For more details please see the references link.
